methods.name: captureAudio

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise with array of captured media files

methods.docs: Launch audio recorder application for recording audio clip(s).

methods.name: captureImage

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise with array of captured media files

methods.docs: Launch camera application for taking image(s).

methods.name: captureVideo

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise with array of captured media files

methods.docs: Launch device camera application for recording video(s).

methods.name: getFormatData

parameters.name: mediaFile
parameters.docs: - The media file to get format data for

tags.name: param
tags.text: mediaFile - The media file to get format data for

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise with media file format data

methods.docs: Get format data for a media file.

interfaces.name: MediaFile
interfaces.docs: Encapsulates properties of a media capture file

properties.name: name
properties.docs: The name of the file, without path information

properties.name: fullPath
properties.docs: The full path of the file, including the name

properties.name: type
properties.docs: The MIME type of the file

properties.name: lastModifiedDate
properties.docs: The date and time that the file was last modified

properties.name: size
properties.docs: The size of the file, in bytes

properties.name: limit
properties.docs:
Maximum number of audio clips to capture. Default is 1.
On iOS, only 1 is supported.

properties.name: duration
properties.docs: Maximum duration of an audio clip in seconds.

properties.name: limit
properties.docs: Maximum number of images to capture. Default is 1.

properties.name: quality
properties.docs:
The quality of saved image in range [0-100]. Default is 100.
Android only.

properties.name: limit
properties.docs:
Maximum number of video clips to capture. Default is 1.
On iOS, only 1 is supported.

properties.name: duration
properties.docs: Maximum duration of a video clip in seconds.

properties.name: quality
properties.docs:
The quality of saved video. 0 = low, 1 = high. Default is 1.
iOS only.

interfaces.name: MediaFileData
interfaces.docs: Encapsulates format information about a media file

properties.name: codecs
properties.docs: The actual format of the audio and video content

properties.name: bitrate
properties.docs: The average bitrate of the content. The value is zero for images.

properties.name: height
properties.docs: The height of the image or video in pixels. The value is zero for audio clips.

properties.name: width
properties.docs: The width of the image or video in pixels. The value is zero for audio clips.

properties.name: duration
properties.docs: The length of the video or sound clip in seconds. The value is zero for images.
